item.title: By: Quora
item.dc:creator: Quora
item.description:
<strong>Who is the best and most legendary troll that the Internet has ever known? Why?...</strong>
Demeter. In 2007, a gentleman by the name of Demeter [1], the leader of a World of Warcraft guild made a post about that he would "give away his guild" to anyone who anyone who would provide him with details about his wife indulging in voice sex with...
item.content:encoded:
Who is the best and most legendary troll that the Internet has ever known? Why?…

Demeter. In 2007, a gentleman by the name of Demeter [1], the leader of a World of Warcraft guild made a post about that he would “give away his guild” to anyone who anyone who would provide him with details about his wife indulging in voice sex with…

item.title: By: Evil M
item.dc:creator: Evil M
item.description:
I think you should go buy this guild, Foton. I don't think you give us nearly as much WoW drama as you possibly could. Buying this guild would be an investment in a drama-filled future.
Just think of the possibilities.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Heh, funny you mention that. I ran across that SS today when I was "phoning in" the Where in the WoW and I wondered where I got that from. I'll leave that as a teaser for Monday.
Can't remember why I thought it was too inflammatory, because, well ... look at this post right here.
item.content:encoded:
Heh, funny you mention that. I ran across that SS today when I was “phoning in” the Where in the WoW and I wondered where I got that from. I’ll leave that as a teaser for Monday.

Can’t remember why I thought it was too inflammatory, because, well … look at this post right here.
